statements: SELECT * FROM transaction_logs WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, transaction_type, transaction_amount FROM transaction_logs WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT transaction_type FROM transaction_logs WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, transaction_amount FROM transaction_logs WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase' LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM transaction_logs ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_type, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM transaction_logs GROUP BY transaction_type;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM transaction_logs WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase' GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(transaction_id) > 5;
SELECT DISTINCT transaction_type FROM transaction_logs WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM transaction_logs WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs WHERE transaction_amount < 100.00 AND transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM authorized_users WHERE role = 'admin' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, transaction_date FROM transaction_logs WHERE transaction_amount > 500.00 AND user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM authorized_users WHERE role = 'admin');
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM transaction_logs WHERE transaction_amount > 100 AND transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY transaction_amount ASC;

SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, transaction_details FROM transaction_logs INNER JOIN authorized_users ON transaction_logs.user_id = authorized_users.user_id WHERE authorized_users.role = 'Admin' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM authorized_users WHERE role = 'Manager' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs WHERE transaction_amount BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY user_id, transaction_date ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 101;
SELECT user_id, transaction_date FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, amount, description FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 201;
SELECT log_id, user_id, event_type FROM logs ORDER BY log_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, count(*) AS total_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_transactions > 5;
SELECT t.*, u.username FROM transactions t JOIN users u ON t.user_id = u.user_id WHERE u.email LIKE '%example.com' ORDER BY t.transaction_date DESC;
SELECT t.transaction_id, l.event_type, l.log_date FROM transactions t JOIN logs l ON t.transaction_id = l.transaction_id WHERE t.amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs;
SELECT log_id, action, timestamp FROM transaction_logs WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM admin_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, status FROM access_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, action, details->'changed_field' AS field_change FROM transaction_logs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND action = 'UPDATE';
SELECT user_id, count(*) AS log_count FROM access_logs GROUP BY user_id HAVING count(*) > 5 ORDER BY log_count DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(DISTINCT action) AS unique_actions FROM transaction_logs GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY unique_actions DESC;
SELECT user_accounts.username, access_logs.timestamp AS last_login FROM user_accounts JOIN access_logs ON user_accounts.user_id = access_logs.user_id ORDER BY last_login DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs ORDER BY log_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, action, timestamp FROM unauthorized_access WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE is_admin = true;
SELECT timestamp, action FROM transaction_logs WHERE details IS NOT NULL;
SELECT username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE username LIKE '%john%' LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, action FROM transaction_logs WHERE details LIKE '%error%' ORDER BY log_id ASC;
SELECT username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE is_admin = TRUE;
SELECT action_name FROM action_types WHERE action_name ILIKE 'log%' ORDER BY action_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, activity_description, timestamp FROM user_activities WHERE activity_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY activity_id ASC;
